title: Handle a Grade Crossing Malfunction
description: A citizen reports that the lights at a railroad grade crossing are flashing, but no train is coming. A dispatcher must investigate.

tasks.description: Receive a report of a malfunctioning grade crossing at a specific street.
Check the system for any trains in the vicinity of the crossing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms there are no trains nearby.

tasks.description: Dispatch a signal maintainer to the location to inspect and repair the crossing equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A repair crew is sent to the site.

tasks.description: Issue a 'slow order' to any trains that will pass through the area, instructing them to approach the crossing prepared to stop until the repair is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: A speed restriction is put in place to ensure safety.
